text: Iye Musa akati: “Zvirokwazvo, (Allah) vati: ‘Imombe isina kumbopingudzwa, isingarimi kana kudiridza mapindu, yakakwana ine hutano hwakanaka isina rimwe rudzi (kunze kwe rwendarama inobwinya).’” Vakati: “Zvino wauya nechokwadi.” Nekudaro vakabva vaiuraya kunyangwe zvazvo vakange vave pedyo nokusazviita
